name: The Pedestrian
description:
This image was taken from inside my favorite local cafe during a surprise snow and ice storm that made the city feel like the Arctic Circle.  I took a number of burst shots to catch a pedestrian (there weren't many) in just the right place in relation to the condensation and streaks on the glass. Patience paid off. I later added an abstract city skyline, then added a texture to create an otherworldly feel. All of this gave my pedestrian subject the appearance of an extraterrestrial biped exploring our very cold planet.

About the View Portal
The “view portal” that frames the image is a photograph of an industrial window in a renovated cookie factory. The window provides a gateway into fanciful realms where you can explore worlds familiar and unknown.
